name: Maintenance Report
about: Report a maintenance or housekeeping task
title: "Maintenance: [Short description of the task]"
labels: maintenance
assignees: ""

---

## Task Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task that needs to be performed.

## Impact
Explain the impact of this maintenance task (e.g., improves performance, reduces technical debt, fixes security vulnerabilities).

## Dependencies
List any dependencies or prerequisites for this task (e.g., other tasks that need to be completed first, tools that need to be installed).

## Additional Context
Add any other context or details about the maintenance task here.
